name: Bombs Away (itch)
description:
Avoid the bombs at all cost.

Left click or drag to select the people and right click to move them around. Keep as many alive for as long as possible and try to beat your highscore.

If I had more time I’d probably add a nicer looking UI, some kind of background as well as pickups - ie. extra lives and stuff! I ended up working most of Saturday then getting distracted and playing games for most of Sunday. Need to organise my time a bit better! :)

Design, Artwork and Programming by Tom Marsland - @Marsbard_ on twitter

Sound effects and music were sourced from opengameart.org:

Explosion - Luke.RUSTLTD - https://opengameart.org/content/bombexplosion8bit

Music - rezoner - https://opengameart.org/content/happy-arcade-tune
